Analyze heterogeneous effects from simulation output

Source: R/margot-heterogeneity-example.R
analyze_heterogeneity.Rd

Helper function to analyze treatment effect heterogeneity from margot_simulate output with custom heterogeneity parameters.

Usage

analyze_heterogeneity(
  data,
  treatment_wave = 2,
  outcome_wave = 3,
  effect_modifiers = c("b1", "b2", "b3", "t0_y", "t0_a")
)

Arguments

data

Output from margot_simulate

treatment_wave

Wave of treatment to analyze (default 2)

outcome_wave

Wave of outcome to analyze (default 3)

effect_modifiers

Character vector of baseline variables to test

Value

Data frame with heterogeneity statistics
